name: Show Variations For Woocommerce
author: FLINIMI

sections.description:
Show Product Variations For Woocommerce is Woocommerce plugin to manage the display of variations, including the following:

  • Show Variations As Single Product On Catalog Pages (shop, category, tag, search)
  • Exclude variations by attributes
  • Exclude variations by category
  • Hide parent variable product
  • Show Variations Dropdown On Shop & Category
  • Show Variations In Shortcodes
  • Search variations by typing search keywords
  • Add custom name for variation
  • Show Lowest/Highest Price for variable product

Upgrading from 1.6

It’s completely safe to upgrade from last release, there is no breaking changes, just cleaner code and new features.

Feedback

We are developing this plugin for you.
If you discover a bug, you need a feature or have any idea to, let us know by posting your suggestion on the plugin reviews page Reviews
or you can write us
sections.installation: Go to admin in WooCommerce > WC SHOW VARIATION SETTINGS just enable settings
